operations.summary: Returns a list of possible values to be used in querying

parameters.name: X-User-Token
parameters.description: The token you recieved when you authenticated the user

operations.summary:
Returns a list of achievements earned by users based on query parameters.
              Query parameters can be combined as desired.
              Award type id is required if achievement id is provided

parameters.name: X-User-Token
parameters.description: The token you recieved when you authenticated the user

operations.summary: Returns achievment details, including requirements, for a given achievement

parameters.name: X-User-Token
parameters.description: The token you recieved when you authenticated the user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the achievement being updated

parameters.name: award_type_id
parameters.description: Id of the Award Type for the achievement being updated

operations.summary: Update achievment details, including requirements, for a given achievement

parameters.name: X-User-Token
parameters.description: The token you recieved when you authenticated the user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the user achievement being updated

parameters.name: award_type_id
parameters.description: Id of the Award Type for the achievement being updated

parameters.name: achievement[completed_on]
parameters.description: Date the achievement was completed in YYYY-MM-DD format

parameters.name: achievement[award_card_front_image_content]
parameters.description: Base 64 encoded image content of the front of an award card for the achievement. Currently ignored unless the achievement is a BSA Merit Badge.

parameters.name: achievement[award_card_images_type]
parameters.description: File extension of the award card images - must be the same type for the front and back, if included. Currently ignored unless the achievement is a BSA Merit Badge.

parameters.name: achievement[award_card_back_image_content]
parameters.description: Base 64 encoded image content of the back of an award card for the achievement. Currently ignored unless the achievement is a BSA Merit Badge.

parameters.name: achievement[children][id]
parameters.description: Id of the requirement to be updated

parameters.name: achievement[children][completed_on]
parameters.description: Date the requirement was completed in YYYY-MM-DD format
